com.pedroalmir.athena.core.type.container
Class Matrix.Builder

java.lang.Object
  com.pedroalmir.athena.core.type.container.Matrix.Builder
Enclosing class:
Matrix
public static final class Matrix.Builder
extends java.lang.Object

A builder object to help with the construction of Matrix instances.

Method Summary

Method Detail

dimensions

public Matrix.Builder dimensions(int rows,
                                 int columns)
Define the dimensions (rows and columns) that the built up Matrix will contain.

Parameters:
rows - The number of rows.
columns - The number of columns.
Returns:
The current Builder.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if rows or columns are less than 1.

addRow

public Matrix.Builder addRow(java.lang.Double... columnValues)
Add a row vector, for inclusion in the built up Matrix.

Parameters:
columnValues - The values for the columns.
Returns:
the current Builder.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the columnValues are not the same dimensions / length that is expected.

addRow

public Matrix.Builder addRow(java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.Double> iterable)
Add a row vector, for inclusion in the built up Matrix.

Parameters:
iterable - The values for the columns.
Returns:
the current Builder.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the columnValues are not the same dimensions / length that is expected.

identity

public Matrix.Builder identity()
Define that the built up Matrix should be an identity Matrix. All added row vectors or position values will be discarded if the built up Matrix is to be an identity Matrix.

Returns:
The current Builder.

valueAt

public Matrix.Builder valueAt(int row,
                              int col,
                              double value)
Define that at a specific value for a defined grid point within the built up Matrix.

This operation will override any values specified by a row vector addition.

Parameters:
row - The row number, indexed from 0.
col - The column number, indexed from 0.
value - The value to be set at the defined location.
Returns:
The current Builder.

build

public Matrix build()
Build the Matrix instance, based on the currently defined builder.

Returns:
A new immutable Matrix instance.
